SEARCH
Package primitives

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
primitives.Point
primitives.Vector
public class Vector extends Point
Represents a 3D vector with x, y, and z components. Extends the Point class to reuse its methods for vector operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vector

      public Vector(double d1, double d2, double d3)
      Constructs a new vector with the specified x, y, and z components.
      Parameters:
      d1 - The x component of the vector.
      d2 - The y component of the vector.
      d3 - The z component of the vector.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the vector is a zero vector.

    • Vector

      public Vector(Double3 xyz)
      Constructs a new vector from a Double3 object.
      Parameters:
      xyz - The Double3 object containing the x, y, and z components of the vector.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the vector is a zero vector.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks if this vector is equal to another object. Two vectors are equal if their x, y, and z components are equal.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Point
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare with.
      Returns:
      True if the objects are equal, false otherwise.
